org.descripter.js.ss

Class Scriptizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.api.Context<Key,java.lang.Object,W>
      • org.descripter.js.api.Objective<W>
        • org.descripter.js.api.Script<S>
          • org.descripter.js.Visitor<Scriptlet<? extends Daemon>>
            • org.descripter.js.ss.Scriptizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, JSSPParserVisitor

    public class Scriptizer
extends Visitor<Scriptlet<? extends Daemon>>
implements JSSPParserVisitor

    Converts server-pages to JavaScript.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org
